section.heading: Revenue bonds, notes, or other obligations; loans and grants.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 116 of Anacostia Waterfront Corporation Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-586, November 1, 2004, 51 DCR 10681).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 3 of NCRC and AWC Debt Acquisition Delegation Authority Emergency Amendment Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-405, June 26, 2006, 53 DCR 5417).
